attributes.action: People coming here from the eu should take the life in the uk test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Spouses of British citizens who marry outside the eu need to take the life in the uk test to gain indefinite leave to stay, While immigrants coming from the eu who cannot speak english or know anything about the country dont have to, this seems like discrimination, some of this eu immigrants from romania are coming here to beg on the streets and cant speak english while a british citizen who has worked here and paid tax needs to pay high fees to bring a spouse here and the spouse needs to do life in the uk test, this is blatant discrimination.
